title: Akage no Anne (Anne of Green Gables)
synopsis: Life isn't easy for Anne Shirley, an 11-year-old orphan with a vast imagination and a short temper. In a twist of fate, she gets taken into the Cuthbert house in Avonlea. The elderly occupants Marilla and Matthew Cuthbert were looking for a young boy to help in the fields, but they're in for quite a shock when they realize Anne is a girl.
related_anime: ['Akage no Anne Specials', 'Konnichiwa Anne: Before Green Gables', 'Akage no Anne: Green Gables e no Michi', 'Shiawase Pasta Story', 'Akage no Anne']
